const getData = (props) => {
  const { pageSize, currentPage, orderBy, search } = props;
  let resultData = data.filter((row, idx) => idx < pageSize);

  let obj = {
    status: true,
    totalItem: pageSize.length,
    totalPage: 1,
    pageSize: pageSize.toString(),
    currentPage: currentPage.toString(),
    data: resultData
  };

  return obj;
};
export default getData;
